verses.verse: And Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> full <S%G4134><s%> of the Holy <S%G40><s%> Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> returned <S%G5290><s%> from the Jordan <S%G2446><s%> and was led <S%G71><s%> about by the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> in the wilderness <S%G2048><s%>

for forty <S%G5065><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> being tempted <S%G3985><s%> by the devil. <S%G1228><s%> And He ate <S%G2068><s%> nothing <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3762><s%> during <S%G1722><s%> those <S%G1565><s%> days; <S%G2250><s%> and when they had ended, <S%G4931><s%> He became hungry. <S%G3983><s%>

And the devil <S%G1228><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "If <S%G1487><s%> You are the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> tell <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> stone <S%G3037><s%> to become <S%G1096><s%> bread. <S%G740><s%>"
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> him, "It is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'Man <S%G444><s%> shall not live <S%G2198><s%> on bread <S%G740><s%> alone. <S%G3441><s%>'"
And he led <S%G321><s%> Him up and showed <S%G1166><s%> Him all <S%G3956><s%> the kingdoms <S%G932><s%> of the world <S%G3625><s%> in a moment <S%G4743><s%> of time. <S%G5550><s%>

And the devil <S%G1228><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "I will give <S%G1325><s%> You all <S%G537><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> domain <S%G1849><s%> and its glory; <S%G1391><s%> for it has been handed <S%G3860><s%> over <S%G3860><s%> to me, and I give <S%G1325><s%> it to whomever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> I wish. <S%G2309><s%>
"Therefore <S%G3767><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> You worship <S%G4352><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> me, it shall all <S%G3956><s%> be Yours. <S%G4674><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "It is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'You shall worship <S%G4352><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God <S%G2316><s%> and serve <S%G3000><s%> Him only. <S%G3441><s%>'"

And he led <S%G71><s%> Him to Jerusalem <S%G2419><s%> and had Him stand <S%G2476><s%> on the pinnacle <S%G4419><s%> of the temple, <S%G2413><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to Him, "If <S%G1487><s%> You are the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> throw <S%G906><s%> Yourself <S%G4572><s%> down <S%G2736><s%> from here; <S%G1782><s%>
for it is written, <S%G1125><s%> 'He will give <S%G1781><s%> His angels <S%G32><s%> charge <S%G1781><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> You to guard <S%G1314><s%> You,'
and, 'On [their] hands <S%G5495><s%> they will bear <S%G142><s%> You up, Lest <S%G3379><s%> You strike <S%G4350><s%> Your foot <S%G4228><s%> against <S%G4314><s%> a stone. <S%G3037><s%>' "

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answered <S%G611><s%> and said <S%G3004><s%> to him, "It is said, <S%G3004><s%> 'You shall not put <S%G1598><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> your God <S%G2316><s%> to the test. <S%G1598><s%>'"

And when the devil <S%G1228><s%> had finished <S%G4931><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> temptation, <S%G3986><s%> he departed <S%G868><s%> from Him until <S%G891><s%> an opportune <S%G2540><s%> time. <S%G2540><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> returned <S%G5290><s%> to Galilee <S%G1056><s%> in the power <S%G1411><s%> of the Spirit; <S%G4151><s%> and news <S%G5345><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> Him spread <S%G1831><s%> through <S%G2596><s%> all <S%G3650><s%> the surrounding <S%G4066><s%> district. <S%G4066><s%>
And He [began] teaching <S%G1321><s%> in their synagogues <S%G4864><s%> and was praised <S%G1392><s%> by all. <S%G3956><s%>

And He came <S%G2064><s%> to Nazareth, <S%G3478><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> He had been <S%G1510><s%> brought <S%G5142><s%> up; and as was His custom, <S%G1486><s%> He entered <S%G1525><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> on the Sabbath, <S%G4521><s%> and stood <S%G450><s%> up to read. <S%G314><s%>

And the book <S%G975><s%> of the prophet <S%G4396><s%> Isaiah <S%G2268><s%> was handed <S%G1929><s%> to Him. And He opened <S%G455><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> and found <S%G2147><s%> the place <S%G5117><s%> where <S%G3757><s%> it was written, <S%G1125><s%>

" The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is upon Me, Because <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1752><s%> He anointed <S%G5548><s%> Me to preach <S%G2097><s%> the gospel <S%G2097><s%> to the poor. <S%G4434><s%> He has sent <S%G649><s%> Me to proclaim <S%G2784><s%> release <S%G859><s%> to the captives, <S%G164><s%> And recovery <S%G309><s%> of sight <S%G309><s%> to the blind, <S%G5185><s%> To set <S%G649><s%> free <S%G1722><s%> <S%G859><s%> those who are downtrodden, <S%G2352><s%>
To proclaim <S%G2784><s%> the favorable <S%G1184><s%> year <S%G1763><s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>"

And He closed <S%G4428><s%> the book, <S%G975><s%> and gave <S%G591><s%> it back <S%G591><s%> to the attendant, <S%G5257><s%> and sat <S%G2523><s%> down; <S%G2523><s%> and the eyes <S%G3788><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> in the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> were fixed <S%G816><s%> upon Him.
And He began <S%G757><s%> to say <S%G3004><s%> to them, "Today <S%G4594><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> Scripture <S%G1124><s%> has been fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> in your hearing. <S%G3775><s%>"

And all <S%G3956><s%> were speaking <S%G3140><s%> well <S%G3140><s%> of Him, and wondering <S%G2296><s%> at the gracious <S%G5485><s%> words <S%G3056><s%> which were falling <S%G1607><s%> from His lips; <S%G4750><s%> and they were saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Is this <S%G3778><s%> not Joseph's son <S%G5207><s%>?"

And He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "No <S%G3843><s%> doubt <S%G3843><s%> you will quote <S%G3004><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> proverb <S%G3850><s%> to Me, 'Physician, <S%G2395><s%> heal <S%G2323><s%> yourself! <S%G4572><s%> Whatever <S%G3745><s%> we heard <S%G191><s%> was done <S%G1096><s%> at Capernaum, <S%G2746><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> in your home <S%G3968><s%> town <S%G3968><s%> as well. <S%G2532><s%>'"
And He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, no <S%G3762><s%> prophet <S%G4396><s%> is welcome <S%G1184><s%> in his home <S%G3968><s%> town. <S%G3968><s%>

" But I say <S%G3004><s%> to you in truth, <S%G225><s%> there were many <S%G4183><s%> widows <S%G5503><s%> in Israel <S%G2474><s%> in the days <S%G2250><s%> of Elijah, <S%G2243><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> the sky <S%G3772><s%> was shut <S%G2808><s%> up for three <S%G5140><s%> years <S%G2094><s%> and six <S%G1803><s%> months, <S%G3376><s%> when <S%G5613><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> famine <S%G3042><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the land; <S%G1093><s%>

and yet Elijah <S%G2243><s%> was sent <S%G3992><s%> to none <S%G3762><s%> of them, but only <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> to Zarephath, <S%G4558><s%> [in the land] of Sidon, <S%G4606><s%> to a woman <S%G1135><s%> who was a widow. <S%G5503><s%>

"And there were many <S%G4183><s%> lepers <S%G3015><s%> in Israel <S%G2474><s%> in the time <S%G1909><s%> of Elisha <S%G1666><s%> the prophet; <S%G4396><s%> and none <S%G3762><s%> of them was cleansed, <S%G2511><s%> but only <S%G1487><s%> <S%G3361><s%> Naaman <S%G3483><s%> the Syrian. <S%G4948><s%>"
And all <S%G3956><s%> in the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> were filled <S%G4092><s%> with rage <S%G2372><s%> as they heard <S%G191><s%> these <S%G3778><s%> things; <S%G3778><s%>

and they rose <S%G450><s%> up and cast <S%G1544><s%> Him out of the city, <S%G4172><s%> and led <S%G71><s%> Him to the brow <S%G3790><s%> of the hill <S%G3735><s%> on which <S%G3739><s%> their city <S%G4172><s%> had been built, <S%G3618><s%> in order <S%G5620><s%> to throw <S%G2630><s%> Him down <S%G2630><s%> the cliff. <S%G2630><s%>
But passing <S%G1330><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> their midst, <S%G3319><s%> He went <S%G4198><s%> His way. <S%G4198><s%>
And He came <S%G2718><s%> down <S%G2718><s%> to Capernaum, <S%G2746><s%> a city <S%G4172><s%> of Galilee. <S%G1056><s%> And He was teaching <S%G1321><s%> them on the Sabbath; <S%G4521><s%>
and they were amazed <S%G1605><s%> at His teaching, <S%G1322><s%> for His message <S%G3056><s%> was with authority. <S%G1849><s%>

And there was a man <S%G444><s%> in the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> possessed <S%G2192><s%> by the spirit <S%G4151><s%> of an unclean <S%G169><s%> demon, <S%G1140><s%> and he cried <S%G349><s%> out with a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%>

"Ha! <S%G1436><s%> What <S%G5101><s%> do we have to do with You, Jesus <S%G2424><s%> of Nazareth <S%G3479><s%>? Have You come <S%G2064><s%> to destroy <S%G622><s%> us? I know <S%G3609><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> You are â€“ the Holy <S%G40><s%> One <S%G40><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>"

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> rebuked <S%G2008><s%> him, saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Be quiet <S%G5392><s%> and come <S%G1831><s%> out of him!" And when the demon <S%G1140><s%> had thrown <S%G4496><s%> him down <S%G4496><s%> in [their] midst, <S%G3319><s%> he came <S%G1831><s%> out of him without <S%G3367><s%> doing <S%G984><s%> him any <S%G3367><s%> harm. <S%G984><s%>

And amazement <S%G2285><s%> came <S%G1096><s%> upon them all, <S%G3956><s%> and they [began] discussing <S%G4814><s%> with one <S%G240><s%> another <S%G240><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "What <S%G5101><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> message <S%G3056><s%>? For with authority <S%G1849><s%> and power <S%G1411><s%> He commands <S%G2004><s%> the unclean <S%G169><s%> spirits, <S%G4151><s%> and they come <S%G1831><s%> out."
And the report <S%G2279><s%> about <S%G4012><s%> Him was getting <S%G1607><s%> out into every <S%G3956><s%> locality <S%G5117><s%> in the surrounding <S%G4066><s%> district. <S%G4066><s%>

And He arose <S%G450><s%> and [left] the synagogue, <S%G4864><s%> and entered <S%G1525><s%> Simon's home. <S%G3614><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> Simon's mother-in-law was suffering <S%G4912><s%> from a high <S%G3173><s%> fever; <S%G4446><s%> and they made <S%G2065><s%> request <S%G2065><s%> of Him on her behalf. <S%G4012><s%>

And standing <S%G2186><s%> over <S%G1883><s%> her, He rebuked <S%G2008><s%> the fever, <S%G4446><s%> and it left <S%G863><s%> her; and she immediately <S%G3916><s%> arose <S%G450><s%> and waited <S%G1247><s%> on them.

And while the sun <S%G2246><s%> was setting, <S%G1416><s%> all <S%G537><s%> who <S%G3745><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> any sick <S%G770><s%> with various <S%G4164><s%> diseases <S%G3554><s%> brought <S%G71><s%> them to Him; and laying <S%G2007><s%> His hands <S%G5495><s%> on every <S%G1538><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of them, He was healing <S%G2323><s%> them.

And demons <S%G1140><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> were coming <S%G1831><s%> out of many, <S%G4183><s%> crying <S%G2905><s%> out and saying, <S%G3004><s%> "You are the Son <S%G5207><s%> of God! <S%G2316><s%>" And rebuking <S%G2008><s%> them, He would not allow <S%G1439><s%> them to speak, <S%G2980><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> they knew <S%G3609><s%> Him to be the Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

And when day <S%G2250><s%> came, <S%G1096><s%> He departed <S%G1831><s%> and went <S%G4198><s%> to a lonely <S%G2048><s%> place; <S%G5117><s%> and the multitudes <S%G3793><s%> were searching <S%G1934><s%> for Him, and came <S%G2064><s%> to Him, and tried to keep <S%G2722><s%> Him from going <S%G4198><s%> away <S%G4198><s%> from them.

But He said <S%G3004><s%> to them, "I must <S%G1163><s%> preach <S%G2097><s%> the kingdom <S%G932><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to the other <S%G2087><s%> cities <S%G4172><s%> also, <S%G2532><s%> for I was sent <S%G649><s%> for this <S%G3778><s%> purpose."
And He kept on preaching <S%G2784><s%> in the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> of Judea. <S%G2453><s%>
